summary: This document is an email chain from March 2021 regarding the organization and clarification of document batches in the US v. Epstein Relativity database. It discusses the contents of BATCH003 (USAO-SDFL data) and BATCH004 (OPR Materials), and includes an attached Search Terms Report (STR).

persons.name: Marie Villatana
persons.context: Her name appears in the folder path description for BATCH004 - OPR Materials, indicating she may be associated with the organization or handling of those documents.

events.title: Email exchange regarding Epstein document batches
events.description: Email correspondence clarifying the contents of BATCH003 (USAO-SDFL data) and BATCH004 (OPR Materials) in the US v. Epstein Relativity database, including the sending of a Search Terms Report (STR).

keyFacts: The email discusses the organization of the US v. Epstein Relativity database, specifically batches labeled BATCH003 and BATCH004.
BATCH003 contains data from the USAO-SDFL (U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of Florida) from a folder dated 2020-10-15.
BATCH004 contains OPR (Office of Professional Responsibility) Materials from a folder associated with Marie Villatana, dated 2020-08-26 and 2020-09-09.
A Search Terms Report (STR) was generated and attached to the correspondence on March 15, 2021.
The communication is part of procedural coordination between parties involved in managing the Epstein case documents.
